primary: Scripting skills in Python, Shell, or Bash
all: Scripting skills in Python, Shell, or Bash

jd: HelloGreeting From WISE Q I am Himanshu Pandey, a Sr Technical Recruiter from WISE Q, a leading provider of US IT staffing. After carefully reviewing your profile, I believe that your skills align perfectly with my client's expectations for the current requirements. If you are open to exploring new opportunities in the USA, please respond to this email or feel free to contact me at Direct 512 957 8275. Job Title: Lead Python AWS Developer** Location: Austin, TX (Day 1 Onsite) Contract Type: Long-term, Hybrid (3 days onsite per week) Client:** Direct client opportunity **Note:** - No graduates from JNTU or Osmania universities. - No OPT/CPT/L1 candidates. - Only quality candidates local to Texas will be considered. Here’s a detailed job description based on your requirements: ### **Position Overview:**We are seeking a **Lead Python AWS Developer** with 12-15 years of strong experience to join our team in Austin, TX. The ideal candidate will possess extensive hands-on experience with Python and AWS, along with a solid understanding of cloud technologies and data engineering. ### **Key Responsibilities:**- Design, develop, and maintain backend services and APIs using Python and Flask.- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.- Implement automation of REST APIs and data pipelines.- Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.- Manage and utilize various AWS and GCP datastore services.- Troubleshoot and resolve issues with applications and APIs.- Develop and maintain complex SQL queries for data retrieval and manipulation.- Mentor junior developers and provide technical guidance. **Required Skills and Experience:**- **Python:** 10+ years of strong hands-on experience.- **AWS:** 2-5 years of experience with various AWS services.- **Google Cloud Platform (GCP):** 2-5 years of experience.- **Data Engineering:** 5-10 years of experience in data pipeline development.- **Cloud (IaaS):** 2-5 years of experience with infrastructure as a service.- **DevOps/SRE:** 5-10 years of experience in DevOps practices.- **Elasticsearch:** 2-5 years of experience.- **MongoDB:** 2-5 years of experience.- Strong scripting skills in Python, Shell, or Bash (or equivalent).- Familiarity with Terraform and CloudFormation for infrastructure as code.- Good understanding of datastore technologies including RDS, Aurora, GCS, DynamoDB, etc.- Advanced Python programming skills, including async I/O, FastAPI, and event loops.- Experience with UI/UX development using ReactJS is a plus. **Preferred Qualifications:**- Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work in a fast-paced environment.- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.- Experience working in Agile/Scrum methodologies.
